She is passionate about empowering communities through communication and driving meaningful connections between brands and their audiences.

stephen.fullDescription: Stephen Ekomu is a dynamic business growth strategist and marketing expert with over 12 years of experience in driving digital transformation across East and Central Africa. As a key member of the PAAN leadership team, he has been instrumental in developing innovative marketing strategies that resonate with diverse African markets. Stephen's expertise lies in business development, digital marketing, and creating sustainable growth models for creative agencies. He holds a Bachelor's degree in Business Administration and has completed advanced certifications in Digital Marketing and Strategic Management. His innovative approach to market penetration and brand positioning has helped numerous businesses achieve remarkable growth across the African continent. Stephen is passionate about leveraging technology to bridge cultural gaps and create meaningful connections between brands and their target audiences.

khensani.name: KHENSANI-WONDER MABUNDA
khensani.title: Founder & CEO
khensani.description: Khensani-Wonder Mabunda is the visionary founder and CEO of KW Kreatives, an innovative marketing, media, advertising and PR agency that has redefined brand development and strategy. With a background in labour and trademark law, she seamlessly blends strategic business insight with creative flair.
khensani.fullDescription: Khensani-Wonder Mabunda is the visionary founder and CEO of KW Kreatives, an innovative marketing, media, advertising and PR agency that has redefined brand development and strategy. With a background in labour and trademark law, Khensani's early corporate career provided a solid foundation for her transition into the world of branding and marketing, where she seamlessly blends strategic business insight with creative flair. As a dynamic and forward-thinking leader, Khensani excels in business and brand development, negotiations, marketing, and communications. Her passion for the ever-evolving branding landscape led to the creation of KW Kreatives, a company dedicated to helping organisations build authentic, relevant, and impactful brands. Khensani has earned prestigious recognition including AdForum PHNX Awards Jury Member (2024 & 2025), Effie Awards Panel Judge (2025), Y20 Member - G20 Work Force for the Youth, Global CEO Excellence Award (UK, 2024) as Marketing and Media CEO of the Year (South Africa), and Middle East CEO of the Year Awards (2024) as Best Emerging Marketing & PR CEO (South Africa). Under Khensani's guidance, KW Kreatives is redefining the landscape of branding, championing the belief that effective marketing transcends traditional campaigns and brand identity—it's about crafting meaningful, unforgettable experiences that build enduring relationships with audiences.
achievements: Founder & CEO of KW Kreatives - innovative marketing, media, advertising and PR agency

whoCanParticipate.title: Who can participate in the program?
whoCanParticipate.content: The program is open to established marketing and creative agencies across Africa who are looking to expand their reach, merge with complementary businesses, or prepare for a strategic exit. We work with agencies of all sizes, from boutique studios to regional powerhouses.

whatServices.title: What services does PAAN provide?
whatServices.content: PAAN provides comprehensive M&A support including deal sourcing, due diligence, valuation services, negotiation support, and post-transaction integration guidance. We also offer strategic consulting to help agencies position themselves for successful transactions.

howLong.title: How long does the M&A process typically take?
howLong.content: The timeline varies depending on the complexity of the transaction, but typically ranges from 6-18 months from initial consultation to deal closure. We work closely with all parties to ensure a smooth and efficient process.

costs.title: What are the costs involved?
costs.content: Our fee structure is transparent and success-based. We offer an initial consultation at no cost, followed by a structured fee arrangement that aligns with your transaction goals. Contact us for a detailed breakdown of our services and pricing.
